title: Strategies to Enhance the Effectiveness of Tablet PC Use in Digital Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Analysis and application of tablet PC use cases considering differences between urban and rural educational environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more self-regulated learning strategies utilizing tablet PCs

Learners will design ≥3 utilization plans for tablet PCs as collaborative learning tools during a 2–4-week mid-term course and submit executable scenarios (including learning objectives, activity procedures, assessment methods) in A4 1-page formats per plan.

Learners will write an effectiveness analysis report (≥5 pages) on tablet PC utilization considering urban/rural learning environment differences (internet speed, device accessibility, teacher support levels), propose ≥3 actionable improvement strategies based on analysis, and finalize strategies achieving ≥80% satisfaction in peer and instructor feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
